com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system

Interface IRelationshipSelectionModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRelationshipSelectionModel

    public interface IRelationshipSelectionModel
    A relationship selection model is used keep track of the currently selected relationships in the RelationshipLayer.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    RelationshipLayer.getSelectionModel(), RelationshipLayer.getSelectedRelationships()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRelationshipSelectionModelListener(IRelationshipSelectionModelListener l)
      Adds a listener to the model so that changes to the selection can be detected.
      void addSelection(Collection<IRelationship> relationships)
      Adds several relationships to the selection.
      void clearSelection()
      Removes all relationships from the model, hence deselecting them.
      Collection<IRelationship> getSelection()
      Returns all relationship model object that are currently selected.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns TRUE if currently no relationships are selected.
      boolean isSelected(IRelationship relationship)
      Returns TRUE if the given relationship object is selected.
      void removeRelationshipSelectionModelListener(IRelationshipSelectionModelListener l)
      Removes a listener from the model.
      void removeSelection(Collection<IRelationship> relationships)
      Removes several relationships from the selection.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns TRUE if currently no relationships are selected.
        Returns:
        TRUE if model does not know of any selected relationships
        Since:
        2.0

      • isSelected

        boolean isSelected(IRelationship relationship)
        Returns TRUE if the given relationship object is selected.
        Parameters:
        relationship - the relationship to check for its selection state
        Returns:
        TRUE if the given relationship is selected
        Since:
        2.0

      • getSelection

        Collection<IRelationship> getSelection()
        Returns all relationship model object that are currently selected.
        Returns:
        all selected relationships
        Since:
        2.0

      • addSelection

        void addSelection(Collection<IRelationship> relationships)
        Adds several relationships to the selection.
        Parameters:
        relationships - the selected relationships
        Since:
        2.0

      • removeSelection

        void removeSelection(Collection<IRelationship> relationships)
        Removes several relationships from the selection.
        Parameters:
        relationships - the deselected relationships
        Since:
        2.0

      • clearSelection

        void clearSelection()
        Removes all relationships from the model, hence deselecting them.
        Since:
        2.0

      • addRelationshipSelectionModelListener

        void addRelationshipSelectionModelListener(IRelationshipSelectionModelListener l)
        Adds a listener to the model so that changes to the selection can be detected.
        Parameters:
        l - the model listener
        Since:
        2.0

      • removeRelationshipSelectionModelListener

        void removeRelationshipSelectionModelListener(IRelationshipSelectionModelListener l)
        Removes a listener from the model.
        Parameters:
        l - the model listener
        Since:
        2.0
